content: Son of a poet, this American rapper and actor has released several albums and appeared in numerous films. His name is "Will" what?

You're thinking of Will Smith, right? He's a really famous guy who started off as a rapper in the group DJ Jazzy Jeff & the Fresh Prince and then became a big movie star. He's got a lot of hits, like "The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air," "Men in Black," and "Independence Day." His dad was a诗人, so he comes from a creative family. Is there something specific you want to know about him?
